#一、基于vip等级的用户每天消耗元宝统计
##appstore*7月13日*基于VIP等级的元宝消耗统计
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
appstoreVip <- read.csv("resources/appstore_vip_11_11.csv",header=T)
p <- ggplot(data=appstoreVip,aes(x=vip_level,y=as.numeric(total_gem_used)))
p + geom_histogram(binwidth=4)
```


##appstore活跃用户*7月1日*至*10月31日*元宝消耗统计

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
appstoreGoldIngot <- read.csv("resources/appstore_vip_goldingot.csv",header=T)
qplot(as.Date(date),total_gem_used,data=appstoreGoldIngot,colour=factor(vip_level))
```
